definition: to dream about (sth or sb)/to see in a dream
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Hope you dream of that soone.
He dreamed a black swan and several swallows flying in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 他夢見一隻黑天鵝和幾隻燕子在空中飛翔。

sentences.english: Yeah. Being chased is the big one.
sentences.chinese: 是的，很多人都夢見被追。

sentences.english: Dream nosegay , mean to have to get, the ability on good terms luck.
sentences.chinese: 夢見花束，意味着有所獲，能交好運。

sentences.english: The Emperor Mingdi of the Eastern Han Dynasty dreamt of a golden man flying over the palace.
sentences.chinese: 東漢明帝夢見一個金人飛行於宮殿之上。

sentences.english: You are the one that I can laugh when I dream of you.
sentences.chinese: 你是我治癒我心疾的良藥，夢見你時我都會笑。

sentences.english: Once we dreamt that we were strangers.
sentences.chinese: 死生契闊有一次，我們夢見大家都是不相識的。

sentences.english: The soldier often dreams of home .
Once we dreamt that we were sangers.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，我們夢見大家都是不瞭解的。

sentences.english: I dreamed that Thornfield was totally destroyed, just a heap of stones.
sentences.chinese: 我夢見特恩費得全被毀了，只剩下一堆石頭。

sentences.english: The alternative is when you dream about remodeling or reconstructing a space.
sentences.chinese: 相對的是你夢見改建或重建一個地方。
原因在於，他昨晚夢見我與他最好的朋友鬼混。

sentences.english: Women want to dream about romance and adventure.
sentences.chinese: 女人想夢見愛情和冒險。

sentences.english: I had a dream days ago. I dreamed the right neighbor of my hometown.
sentences.chinese: 前幾天，做一個夢，夢見我家鄉的右鄰居。

sentences.english: I always dream of myself to be able to fly, can leap the massif and the creek.
sentences.chinese: 我總是夢見自己能飛，能躍過山丘和小河。

definition: to dream/to have a dream/fig. illusion/fantasy/pipe dream
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
to sleepwalk/to journey in a dream
to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy
